about_the_game:
This game is an exploration-based adventure set in the dreams of a girl who has lost her memory.
Explore various locations within her dreams, uncover secrets, and gradually restore her lost memories as the story unfolds.

The game features a combination of RPG-style room exploration and point-and-click puzzles.
Immerse yourself in beautiful pixel art and relaxing music while experiencing the charming story of the protagonist, Leisha.
